languages.text: {n}На полу под вашей клеткой начертан кривой круг, окаймленный нечестивыми символами — в центре такого же круга стоит Блеф. Откуда-то из глубин залы доносится мерный скрежет и глухое бормотание старика — и произносимые им слова явно не имеют ничего общего с готиком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На полу под вашей клеткой начертан кривой круг, окаймленный нечестивыми символами — в центре такого же круга стоит Блеф. Откуда-то из глубин залы доносится мерный скрежет и глухое бомотание старика — и произносимые им слова явно не имеют ничего общего с готиком.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

{n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. The old man at the altar is mixing something in a dirty bowl, muttering to himself, and the veins of thassertium around him pulse with an eerie light.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你看到脚边的地板上刻着记号。那是个歪歪扭扭的圆环，周围画着各种各样的邪恶符号，而闹闹站在另一个圆环的中心处。你听到大厅深处传来了安静的刮擦声，还有某个老人嘟嘟囔囔的声音。你勉强听清了几个词，但听起来完全不像帝国哥特语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到脚边的地板上刻着记号。那是个歪歪扭扭的圆环，周围画着各种各样的邪恶符号，而闹闹站在另一个圆环的中心处。你听到大厅深处传来了安静的刮擦声，还有某个老人嘟嘟囔囔的声音。你勉强听清了几个词，但听起来完全不像帝国哥特语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El suelo está cubierto de marcas: un círculo torcido rodeado por símbolos blasfemos. Farol está en el centro de un círculo idéntico. Desde el interior del salón, oyes un sonido de raspado callado y medido y el murmullo de un anciano. Las pocas palabras que escuchas no suenan a Gótico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ayaklarının altındaki zeminde işaretler var: Kutsal olmayan sembollerle çevrili çarpık bir çember. Kurusıkı, aynı çemberin merkezinde duruyor. Koridorun derinliklerinden sessiz, ölçülü bir kazıma sesi ve yaşlı bir adamın mırıltılarını duyuyorsun. Yakaladığın birkaç kelime, Gotik diline hiç benzemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ayaklarının altındaki zeminde işaretler var: Kutsal olmayan sembollerle çevrili çarpık bir çember. Kurusıkı, aynı çemberin merkezinde duruyor. Koridorun derinliklerinden sessiz, ölçülü bir kazıma sesi ve yaşlı bir adamın mırıltılarını duyuyorsun. Yakaladığın birkaç kelime, Gotik diline hiç benzemiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}足下の床に不浄なシンボルで縁取られた歪んだ円のマーキングがある。ブラフはまったく同じ模様の円の中央に立っている。ホールの奥から、かすかに規則正しい擦れる音と、老人のつぶやく声が聞こえてきた。かろうじて聞き取れたその言葉は、まるで帝国語には聞こえない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}足下の床に不浄なシンボルで縁取られた歪んだ円のマーキングがある。ブラフはまったく同じ模様の円の中央に立っている。ホールの奥から、かすかに規則正しい擦れる音と、老人のつぶやく声が聞こえてきた。かろうじて聞き取れたその言葉は、まるで帝国語には聞こえない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous vos pieds, sur le sol, vous remarquez un cercle tordu bordé de symboles impies. Bluff se tient au centre d'un cercle identique. Vous percevez un raclement léger et mesuré, accompagné par les marmonnements d'un vieil homme, qui semble provenir du fond de la pièce. Les quelques mots que vous parvenez à saisir ne ressemblent pas à du gothique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous vos pieds, sur le sol, vous remarquez un cercle tordu bordé de symboles impies. Bluff se tient au centre d'un cercle identique. Vous percevez un raclement léger et mesuré, accompagné par les marmonnements d'un vieil homme, qui semble provenir du fond de la pièce. Les quelques mots que vous parvenez à saisir ne ressemblent pas à du gothique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf dem Boden zu deinen Füßen sind Markierungen: Ein Kreis umgeben von unheiligen Symbolen. Bluff steht in der Mitte eines identischen Kreises. Du hörst ein leises kratzendes Geräusch und das Murmeln eines alten Mannes aus den Tiefen der Halle ... die wenigen Worte, die du erkennst, klingen nicht nach Gotisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are markings on the floor at your feet: a crooked circle bordered by unholy symbols. Bluff is standing in the centre of an identical circle. You hear a quiet, measured scraping sound and an old man's muttering coming from the depths of the hall — the few words you manage to catch sound nothing like Gothic.{/n}
